metadata.title: CVE-2024-49902 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: check if leafidx greater than num leaves per dmap treesyzbot report a out of bounds in dbSplit, it because dmt_leafidx greaterthan num leaves per dmap tree, add a checking for dmt_leafidx indbFindLeaf.Shaggy:Modified sanity check to apply to control pages as well as leaf pages.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
